QuestData.Title: Arcane Sanctum: Ko'ragh
QuestData.Description: Forget all you know of the ogres on Azeroth, $n. On Draenor they commanded a once-mighty civilization. Even now they threaten to reclaim their former glory.$b$bHighmaul excavations in Nagrand unearthed a mysterious relic. The only ogre to survive direct exposure to this relic was Ko'ragh; he was left with a near-complete immunity to all magic.$b$bKo'ragh must be killed before the ogres learn to replicate his unique powers. Travel to Highmaul and defeat Ko'ragh!
